title: Executive Order 5107-Amendment to Schedule A of the Civil Service Rules
content: Schedule A of positions excepted from the requirement of examination under the civil service rules is hereby amended by the addition of a new subdivision to be numbered XX, said amendment being prepared and recommended by the Civil Service Commission in compliance with the official request of the Chairman of the United States Employees' Compensation Commission:
1. One private secretary or confidential clerk to each member of the United States Employees' Compensation Commission.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5107-Amendment to Schedule A of the Civil Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/360816
